price: Und Allah will eure Reue annehmen; diejenigen aber, die den Begierden folgen, wollen, daß ihr (vom rechten Weg) völlig abweicht.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَيُرِيدُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ أَن تَمِيلُواْ مَيۡلًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yurīdu an yatūba ʿalaykum wayurīdu alladhīna yattabiʿūna al-shahawāti an tamīlū maylan ʿaẓīman
